p: The saturated fatty acids are located almost exclusively at the 1 and 3 positions in vegetable oils TAG. Animal originated fats, e.g., tallow or lard, are almost exclusively equipped with saturated fatty acids at the sn-2 position [ 1]. The lard has been recommended as an alternative to HMF due to much alike HMF structure in terms of fatty acids composition and their distribution in TAG [ 7]. Compared to HMF, the content of palmitic and oleic acids in lard is at same level while the content of essential fatty acids is significantly lower [ 4].
